title: Choukou Senshi Changéríon
resume: Choukou Senshi Changéríon is a Tokusatsu series created by Toei Company, and co-produced by Sega Enterprises. The series aired from April 3, 1996 to December 25, 1996. It was originally planned to run for a full 52 episodes before being cut down to 39 due to low ratings.
